forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few clouds. High near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy. Snow likely late. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow developing after midnight. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will taper off as a few snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will diminish to a few snow showers overnight. Low 32F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low 1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 36F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the day progresses. High 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
